title: yasuo......
body: ok when a yas goes 0/10/0 early game but after reaching 2 items and then 1v5 the whole team afterwards that's when i wonder if they will ever nerf him

replies.body: First of all, he's got nerfs on the pbe. Second, even if Yasuo comes "online" at two items, he can't 1v5 if he's 0/10/0 with only Phantom Dancer and Infinity Edge. A very fed Yasuo can steamroll an enemy team given the right circumstances, but let's not engage in blatant hyperbole, yeah?

> [{quoted}](name=IronwallJackson,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ixznGyi0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-17T07:47:13.179+0000)
>
> First of all, he's got nerfs on the pbe. Second, even if Yasuo comes "online" at two items, he can't 1v5 if he's 0/10/0 with only Phantom Dancer and Infinity Edge. A very fed Yasuo can steamroll an enemy team given the right circumstances, but let's not engage in blatant hyperbole, yeah?

who said it was a phantom dancer
Phantom Dancer + Mallet + IE is currently Yasuo's most successful build, though Shiv+IE might still the most common.
forgot deaths are a combat stat
